mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE username IN (SELECT m.username FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_role r ON m.username = r.username GROUP BY m.username HAVING count(m.username) = 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( name, username, password, email, address, zip_code, birth_date, gender, phone, com_idx, pg_idx, pg_reg_status, pg_reg_date, resume_file, desired_interview_date, assigned_interview_date, interview_status, interview_comment, cover_letter_status, resume_status, withdrawn_date, is_withdrawn, profile_img ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{comIdx}, #{pgIdx}, #{pgRegStatus}, #{pgRegDate}, #{resumeFile}, #{registeredInterviewDate}, #{assignedInterviewDate}, #{interviewStatus}, #{interviewComment}, #{coverLetterStatus}, #{resumeStatus}, #{withdrawnDate}, #{isWithdrawn}, #{profileImg} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, r.* FROM member m JOIN member_role r ON m.username = r.username WHERE m.username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, com_idx = #{comIdx}, resume_file = #{resumeFile}, desired_interview_date = #{registeredInterviewDate}, assigned_interview_date = #{assignedInterviewDate}, interview_status = #{interviewStatus}, interview_comment = #{interviewComment}, coverLetterStatus = #{coverLetterStatus}, resume_status = #{resumeStatus}, join_date = #{joinDate}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate}, withdrawn_date = #{withdrawnDate}, is_withdrawn = #{isWithdrawn} WHERE username = #{username}
UPDATE member SET pg_reg_status = 'Pending', com_idx = null, pg_idx = null WHERE idx = #{param}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m JOIN program p ON m.pg_idx = p.pg_idx WHERE m.pg_idx = #{param}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE m.pg_idx = #{param}) AS totalCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE m.pg_idx = #{param} AND m.pg_reg_status = 'Approved' AND m.interview_status = 'Registered') AS interViewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE m.pg_idx = #{param} AND (m.pg_reg_status = 'Rejected' OR m.pg_reg_status = 'Rejected')) AS rejectedCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m JOIN program p ON m.pg_idx = p.pg_idx WHERE m.pg_idx = #{param} AND m.pg_reg_status = 'Approved' AND m.interview_status = 'Approved' AND p.pg_status = 'Educating') AS eduCount

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND cover_letter_status = 'Pending') AS clPendingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND cover_letter_status = 'Writing') AS clWritngCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND cover_letter_status = 'Complete') AS clCompleteCount

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND resume_status = 'Pending') AS resumePendingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND resume_status = 'Writing') AS resumeWritingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member m WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND resume_status = 'Complete') AS resumeCompleteCount
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, SUBSTRING(pg_reg_date, 1, 10) AS regDate FROM member WHERE pg_idx = #{param} AND pg_reg_date is not null GROUP BY SUBSTRING(pg_reg_date,1,10) ORDER BY regDate DESC
